DOC.brief_summary: This study will investigate several genes and other factors measured in the blood that may cause recurrent acute pancreatitis and chronic pancreatitis.
DOC.detailed_description: This study seeks to enroll people with and without pancreatitis. There is only one study visit to obtain consent, a blood sample and complete a questionnaire.
DOC.criteria: pancreatitis patients who are at least 14 years of age with a diagnosis of acute or chronic pancreatits controls who do not have pancreatitis and must be at least 18 years of age unable or unwilling to sign informed consent
